name: Generate index.html on: push: branches: - master jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v2 - name: Generate index.html run: | echo '' >> index.html cat <>index.html This page is used to distribute a shell script. EOF - name: Commit and push run: | git config --local user.email "action@github.com" git config --local user.name "GitHub Action" git add index.html git commit -m "Update index.html from install.sh" && git push origin master || echo "No changes to commit"
